summary: Never before seen Super 8 home movies filmed by Richard Nixon's closest aides - and convicted Watergate conspirators - offer a surprising and intimate new look into his Presidency.
cast: Richard Nixon|H.R. Haldeman|John Ehrlichman|Dwight Chapin|Spiro Agnew|Neil Armstrong|Edward Cox|Walter Cronkite|John Denver|Phil Donahue|Daniel Ellsberg|Sam Ervin|Hubert H. Humphrey|Lyndon B. Johnson|John Kerry|Henry Kissinger|Zedong Mao|George McGovern|Mike Curb Congregation|Pat Nixon|Tricia Nixon|Laurence O'Brien|Dan Rather|Nancy Reagan|Ronald Reagan|George Romney|Daniel Schorr|Lowell Weicker|Ronald L. Ziegler
keywords: u.s. president|american politics|reference to the new york times|reference to the washington post|the white house
title: Our Nixon
